text: kya tum kahate ho ki ibaraaheem va isamail va isahaaq va aalauden yaakoob sab ke sab yahoodee ya nasaraanee the (ai rasool unase) poochho to ki tum jyaada vaaqif ho ya khuda aur usase badhakar kaun zaalim hoga jisake paas khuda kee taraph se gavaahee (maujood) ho (ki vah yahoodee na the) aur phir vah chhipae aur jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda usase bekhabar nahin
